title: Enhancing App Development Practical Competencies: Game-Based Mobile Training for Strengthening Cybersecurity Manager Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners accurately identify threat types in ≥80% of cases through game-based analysis of real cyberattack scenarios
Through in-game defense strategy simulations, ≥90% of learners explain the security policy establishment process
Ensure learners' security response knowledge improves by ≥15% monthly through periodic formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
